item.title: BO - Design - Image Settings - Import Image type
item.description: BO - Design - Image Settings - Import Image type Steps Step Description Expected result Clic on the “Generate theme image settings” button at the top right A modal should be displayed Case : You don’t have yml file for your theme with image type * Clic on the “import” button * You’ll have a red alert with the message " Your themes doesn’t have image types configured" * You still have 0 image type Case : You have yml file for your theme with image type * Clic on the “import” button * You’ll have a success message “The settings have been successfully updated” * You’ll have your image type Case : You have the same yml file for your theme with image type * Clic on the “import” button * You’ll have a red alert with the message " Your themes doesn’t have image types configured" * You still have the same image type Case : You have the same name on your image type but not the same size on your yml * Clic on the “import” button * You’ll have a red alert with the message " Your themes doesn’t have image types configured" * You still have the same image type Case : You have the same size on your image type but not the same name on your yml * Clic on the “import” button * You’ll have a success message “The settings have been successfully updated” * You’ll have twice your image type

item.title: BO - Design - Image Settings - Image Generation options
item.description: BO - Design - Image Settings - Image Generation options Steps Step Description Expected result Case : Your server doesn’t support Avif * Go to BO > Design > Image Setttings and scroll down to image generation options * JPEG and WebP should be checked * The checkbox of AVIF should be disable * You’ll see an error message next to the Avif : “Your server does not support Avif formar, for more infomation visit this link” Case : Your server support Avif * Go to BO > Design > Image Setttings and scroll down to image generation options * JPEG and WebP should be checked * The checkbox of AVIF should be enable Check the JPEG checkbox ( you should have 3 checkboxes checked ) You should have a message “Caution the selection of several image formats leads to a need for memory capacity greater and impact the perf during the generation” Case : Your server support Avif * Check The AVIF * Uncheck All other image’s format * The checkbox of AVIF should be greyed

item.title: BO - Design - Image Settings - Regenerate thumbnail
item.description: BO - Design - Image Settings - Regenerate thumbnail Steps Step Description Expected result * Go to BO > Design > Image Setttings and scroll down to image generation options * Check all the format you can do * Clic on the “Save” button * All the format should be checked * You should have a message “Caution the selection of several image formats leads to a need for memory capacity greater and impact the perf during the generation” * Scroll down to Regenerate thumbnails.
